schema:abstract.@value: musoW is the online registry of music resources available on the web. It serves the musoW dataset via a number of interfaces for browsing and searching. The interface also allows editing (modifying existing records or creating new ones), searching and querying (via a dedicated SPARQL endpoint). The interface is built on top of CLEF, a LOD-native web application for crowdsourcing.

schema:isBasedOn: musoW is the online registry of music resources available on the web. It serves the musoW dataset via a number of interfaces for browsing and searching. The interface also allows editing (modifying existing records or creating new ones), searching and querying (via a dedicated SPARQL endpoint). The interface is built on top of CLEF, a LOD-native web application for crowdsourcing.
